About

I'm Josh Higgins, owner and operator of Joshua Higgins Lawn Care. I opened for business in 2018 in my hometown of Rochester, MN where I live with my beautiful wife and 3 children.

I fell in love with working outdoors growing up mowing neighborhood lawns as a kid. I take great pride in making your property look it's best and in providing exceptional customer service.

I am detail oriented, honest and will give you a fair price. So call, text or email me today for your free estimate!

Services Offered

in Rochester MN
Spring & Fall Cleanup

Spring and fall are the time to clean up your property by clearing away debris, sticks, and leaves from your yard. This is very important to keep your lawn healthy and looking its best.

At Joshua Higgins Lawn Care I do this by first removing the top layer of leaves and sticks. I then dethatch to remove the thick layer of decaying plant material so air, water and nutrients can reach your grass. I bag and haul away all the debris leaving you with a clean lawn.

Prices for spring and fall cleanup start at $50.00 per hour. Call, text or email for a free estimate!

Lawn Mowing

A properly cut lawn looks amazing and provides many benefits for your lawn. Regularly mowing the lawn keeps the grass length consistent which helps distribute nutrients evenly. It also makes the hardiest shoots proliferate as the weak ones die off improving the look and health of your lawn over time.

At Joshua Higgins Lawn Care it's not just about cutting your grass. I cut your grass, trim and blow off unsightly grass clippings from your driveway and sidewalks. When I leave the first thing I want you to notice is your beautifully cut lawn.

Prices start at $35.00 a lawn. Call, text or email for a free estimate!

Snow Removal

Removing snow from your driveway and sidewalks decreases the risk of injuries and accidents while increasing the curb appeal of your property.

At Joshua Higgins Lawn Care I remove the snow from your driveway and sidewalks and salt the walkways.

Prices starting at $40.00 per driveway and sidewalk. Call, text or email for a free estimate!
